solution_line_template: Since the word score after being tripled was {total_score_tripled} points, then the word score before tripling was {total_score_tripled}/{triple_factor}=<<{total_score_tripled}/{triple_factor}={score_before_tripling}>>{score_before_tripling} points.

If before the word score was tripled, the first and third letters were each valued at one point apiece, then the value of the middle letter was {score_before_tripling}-{first_letter_value}-{third_letter_value}=<<{score_before_tripling}-{first_letter_value}-{third_letter_value}={middle_letter_value}>>{middle_letter_value} points.
